Header: Who got money from Arjun Aloysius ?
Content: So far 31 parliamentarians have said that they did not obtain money from Arjun Aloysius. It means 192 MPs are yet to reveal whether they had got money or not. MP Dayasiri Jayasekeral recently said that bond commission report has mentioned names of 118 persons who had obtained money from Aloysius. 116 more names are yet to be revealed. Only MP Dayasiri Jayasekera and Minister Sarath Fonseka had accepted that they received money from the tainted businessman.
